changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sessions ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, ip CIDR NOT NULL, user_agent TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(user_agent)), operation_system TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(32 > LENGTH(operation_system)), last_activity TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, browser TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(32 > LENGTH(browser)), user_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), created_at TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPZ NULL, deleted_at TIMESTAMPZ NULL, );
